xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/942964-Dead Devils Death Bar 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null The “Dead Devils Death Bar” is a meeting place for various representatives of a newly-formed middle class, who drink and gossip. Their expectations of the place however, will remain unfulfilled, developing into a conspiratorial nightmare. In a single, continual tracking shot, the film narrates the course of one night, with only 9 actors playing the 26 bar patrons, as well as sometimes singing along with the sound-track. Dead Devils Death Bar
